projects.title: Nematron-AI
projects.description: Ollama-powered chatbot built for a real external client under NDA, as part of a UAS project.
projects.role: Implemented backend web scraping and DuckDuckGo search integration. Developed summarization features. Added real-time frontend message streaming. Worked in a closed-source team under NDA.

projects.title: MetPoll
projects.description: Course feedback app for teachers to track lecture performance in real time.
projects.role: Sole backend developer: built REST API (Flask), integrated frontend, tested with Postman.

projects.title: StackConnect
projects.description: Job-seeking platform for developers built with the MERN stack.
projects.role: Built backend (Node.js/Express), login/register flows, API docs (Swagger), deployed to Render.

projects.title: FlightStation Simulator
projects.description: Java app simulating airport customer flow and service points.
projects.role: Built UI (JavaFX, SceneBuilder), translated Finnish codebase, implemented core features, wrote JavaDoc.

projects.title: CryptBorn
projects.description: Top-down pixel-art dungeon crawler built in Godot with procedural rooms, melee combat, and loot.
projects.role: Solo dev: implemented procedural generation, enemy AI, combat, inventory, and item systems.

projects.title: Neural Networking
projects.description: A collection of ML/AI projects implemented in Jupyter Notebooks.

projects.title: Project 1 - Dogs vs Cats
projects.role: Wrote all code and contributed to documentation.
